ProfileName: S. Paola "I Save More so I can Shop More"
text: I'm not a big coffee drinker as I hate the bitterness.  These k-cups changed the way I think of coffee completely.  They are delicious!  My husband does miss the bitterness of regular coffee and I have some friends who think its a bit too sweet so they do a half and half mixture, but for me... perfection!
